languages.text: "Если ты ждал возможности благородно спасти Вольного Торговца из-под огня и заслужить {mf|его|ее} внимание — пора действовать".
"If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."
languages.original_text: "Если ты ждал возможности благородно спасти Вольного Торговца из-под огня и заслужить {mf|его|ее} внимание — пора действовать".

traits.locale_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."
"If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."
"If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."
"If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."
"If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

languages.text: « Si vous attendiez l'occasion de secourir vaillamment {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} sous les tirs ennemis et de gagner son estime, c'est le moment. »
languages.original_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous attendiez l'occasion de secourir vaillamment {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande} sous les tirs ennemis et de gagner son estime, c'est le moment. »

languages.text: 「砲火の中からローグトレーダーを勇敢に救い出し、その信頼を勝ち取る機会を狙っているのなら、今がその時だ」
languages.original_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

traits.locale_text: 「砲火の中からローグトレーダーを勇敢に救い出し、その信頼を勝ち取る機会を狙っているのなら、今がその時だ」

languages.text: «Si estaba esperando la oportunidad de rescatar valientemente a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente en apuros y ganarse su estima, es el momento».
languages.original_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

traits.locale_text: «Si estaba esperando la oportunidad de rescatar valientemente a un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente en apuros y ganarse su estima, es el momento».

languages.text: “如果你一直在等待机会，希望能从敌人的炮火下勇敢地救下行商浪人，赢得{mf|他|她}的好感，那现在正是最合适的机会。”
languages.original_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

traits.locale_text: “如果你一直在等待机会，希望能从敌人的炮火下勇敢地救下行商浪人，赢得{mf|他|她}的好感，那现在正是最合适的机会。”

languages.text: "Eğer bir Hür Tacir'i kahramanca kollayıp saygısını kazanmak için fırsat kolluyorsan harekete geçmenin tam sırası."
languages.original_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

traits.locale_text: "Eğer bir Hür Tacir'i kahramanca kollayıp saygısını kazanmak için fırsat kolluyorsan harekete geçmenin tam sırası."

languages.text: "Falls Ihr auf eine Gelegenheit gewartet habt, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} ritterlich zu retten, um euch {mf|seinen|ihren} Dank zu sichern, wäre das jetzt ein guter Zeitpunkt."
languages.original_text: "If you've been waiting for an opportunity to gallantly rescue a Rogue Trader from under fire and earn {mf|his|her} regard, it's time to act."

traits.locale_text: "Falls Ihr auf eine Gelegenheit gewartet habt, {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin} ritterlich zu retten, um euch {mf|seinen|ihren} Dank zu sichern, wäre das jetzt ein guter Zeitpunkt."
